title: Hackbases or Barbarianism
description:
Hackbases are similar to hackerspaces, but people also live there. The 6th yearly self-org session will present the existing ones, common lessons, and the tools to organize new ones. You should come if you're interested in different ways of living to: have a job + pay rent.
Hackbases are hackerspaces/hacklabs, that people live in.Amazing! What's next:    * https://wiki.hackerspaces.org/Hackbase <--- list of existing hackbases    * join #hackbases on Freenode !    * quit your job and rent    * ???___________See:* https://wiki.hackerspaces.org/Hackbase* https://totalism.org___________SOME INTERESTS:Self-sustainability, off-grid, autarky / resilience and temporary architecture research & alternative construction // Free software and free hardware development // Free Industry // Open data, workflow and organisational technology, Tektology //Digital nomadism // Critical theory // Sound studio, bands, Intermedia Art // Growing food // Renewable energy technologies // Nootropics // A nomad hacker lifestyle in a network of hacklabs // "Coliving" and "Coworking" // Hacker camp // Financial and temporal freedom // Autonomy // YOUR INTEREST HERE
